name: Dynabridge
description:
Create model of a bridge with an excel sheet and adaptive components. This version has a lot of new functionalities and some steps are easier than before.

***Version 0.0.8 has minor bug fixing

Look for "Dynabridge" on YouTube or use the link: https://youtu.be/hO7kpIaslx4?t=1 to see the tutorials presenting how the package works. 

by Andrzej Samsonowicz
contents: Adjust Piers - No description provided, Barrier - No description provided, Bridge Body - No description provided, Create 3D line - No description provided, Create Corridors - No description provided, Local Coordinate Systems  - Makes local CS's out of Aligment as points, Local Coordintate Systems by Grids - No description provided, Multi pier bridge - No description provided, Place Street Lamps - No description provided, Read Alignment From Excel - Reads the coordinates from the excel sheet. Sheet name is needed, Safety Barrier Posts - Adaptive Component, 2 points based, perpendicular to the alignment, Safety Barrier - Adatpive component, parallel to the alignment, 2 points based, Set Bridge's Parameter - No description provided
